.gitignore:
# History files
.Rhistory
.Rapp.history

# Session Data files
.RData
.RDataTmp

# User-specific files
.Ruserdata

# RStudio files
.Rproj.user/
*.Rproj

# OAuth2 token
.httr-oauth

# knitr and R markdown
*.utf8.md
*.knit.md

# R Environment Variables
.Renviron
.Rprofile

# pkgdown site
docs/

# Translation temp files
po/*~

# RStudio Connect folder
rsconnect/

# IDE
.vscode/

# OS
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
main.R:
# Load modules
source('data/data.R')
source('tool/tool.R')

print('Hello, World!')

# Create instances
tool <- Tool$new()
data <- Data$new()
